title: Brownian sheet
summary: In mathematics, a brownian sheet is a multiparametric generalization of the brownian motion to a gaussian random field. This means we generalize the "time" parameter t {\displaystyle t} of a brownian motion B t {\displaystyle B_{t}} from R + {\displaystyle \mathbb {R} _{+}} to R + n {\displaystyle \mathbb {R} _{+}^{n}} .
